sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; const ViewResume = () => { const location = useLocation(); const { resume } = location.state; return (

View Resume

Personal Information

Name: {resume.name}

Email: {resume.email}

Address: {resume.address}

Phone: {resume.phone}

Education

{resume.education.map((edu, index) => (

Institute: {edu.institute}

Year: {edu.year}

Degree: {edu.degree}

))}

Experience

{resume.experience.map((exp, index) => (

Company: {exp.company}

Year: {exp.year}

Designation: {exp.designation}

))}

Skills

{resume.skills.join(', ')}

); }; export default ViewResume;
